name: Space of Chaos
description:
An astronaut is alone on his spaceship, and must fly for as long as possible. However, disaster continues to strike his ship, with fire, flood, asteroids, power outages and fuel shortages plaguing him. How long can you survive the chaos?

Score points by flying the ship for as long as possible. Use WASD to move for character, and up and down arrow keys to move the ship when in fly mode. 

Game made alongside annogu2004
